name: Professional Footballer
overview: Professional Footballer is a football managerial game where instead of managing a team you manage the career of one player in the four top English leagues, cups and European football. You start in the 2nd team as a sub and your aim is to get to the 1st team and become a star player. You have the chance to speak to the manager to change your position or go on the transfer list. You must train twice a week and each training session consists of two questions and four answers for each question about your reaction to certain situations in a match. A successful move gives you the stars and a bar with sub danger while an unsuccessful move loses you stars.
